content: light icy conditions adult headband s/m l/xl is a cozy winter staple with big not today energy in a slimmer lighter headband form my gift to you knit wear and share this pattern includes two sizes adult s/m and l/xl in one file and features bold charted colorwork chart only it s a quick knit perfect for scraps and ideal for warmer winter days knit in the round using light worsted or heavy dk with us 5/6 s/m or us 6/7 l/xl needles stay safe out there when things get ice y love and sass from mn ❄️ notes worked in the round with charted colorwork chart only maintain even gauge and avoid tight floats the chart is designed to minimize long floats but catch as needed great scrap buster + quick knit for lighter/warmer conditions ❄️
